mapper.update: update `user` u set u.number =#{number}, u.password=#{password}, u.nickname=#{nickname}, u.real_name=#{realName}, u.gender=#{gender}, u.phone=#{phone}, u.age=#{age}, u.birthday=#{birthday}, u.create_time=#{createTime}, u.update_time=#{updateTime}, u.order_time=#{orderTime} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select u.number, u.real_name, u.order_time, v.vname, uv.inoculation_time from `user` u, `vaccine` v, `user_vaccine` uv where u.uid = uv.uid and v.vid = uv.vid
select u.uid as id, u.number as number, u.password as password, u.real_name as name, u.nickname, u.gender, u.age from `user` u where u.number = #{username} limit 1
